data.what_is:
artegic AG - Technology for Marketing Engineering! We enable ambitious marketing teams every day to achieve better results.

With over 15 years of experience and know-how in best-of-breed marketing technology, IT integration and best-practice for digital dialogue marketing. artegic addresses marketers who are not satisfied with the customer experience and the results of their current marketing and who therefore want to achieve more with modern means: with individual use-case-based solutions, tested at leading companies. For a faster ways to measureable contributions to business success.

With 80 employees at its German sites in Bonn and Munich, as well as international branches, artegic stands for sustainable and successful dialogue marketing with significantly better results and less operative expenses.

82% of German internet users are in contact with companies via artegic's multi-award winning ELAINE technology. Our customers include RTL, PAYBACK, BMW, BURDA, REWE, maxdome, as well as one in three DAX companies.

Every month, approximately 2.7 billion emails, SMS and social media messages are sent in 141 countries.

artegic is certified company-wide by TUV Rheinland according to the international standard for IT and data security ISO/IEC 27001 and has received several awards for its innovative and trend-setting implementation of data protection requirements, including the eco Internet Award, the Cased Security Award and the International Business award (Stevie).
data.product_description: ELAINE is a software-as-a-service technology for marketing automation and digital dialogue marketing with email and mobile messages. It's main benefits are a fast time-to-market, seamless integration, real-time capability, highly individualized messaging and high standards in privacy and data security.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Unlimited messages (except fee-based services like SMS)
plan_features: ISO 27001 / ISO 27018 / GDPR compliant, server located in Germany

plan_features: Extensive options for expert use cases
ISO 27001 / ISO 27018 / GDPR compliant, server located in Germany

initial_reviews.review_title: Very advanced e-mail-marketing software that offers solutions for many e-mail communication demands
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Artegic ELAINE?
In addition to the ease of creating mailings and managing contact lists and target groups, what sets ELAINE apart for us is its marketing automation. It allows us to create communication sequences via drag and drop, which we can use for reactivation, reminder or follow-up mailings. In this way, we can control communication to the customer in an automated way, which has been very successful for us and, above all, saves a lot of time.

What do you dislike about Artegic ELAINE?
The multitude of functions naturally also leads to a certain complexity of the software. Over time, you will discover more and more functions. The possible uses must be understood and transferred to your own specific use cases in order to be able to use them in a targeted manner. The large number of modules and setting options inevitably sometimes leads to a certain lack of comprehensibility.

What problems is Artegic ELAINE solving and how is that benefiting you?
With ELAINE, we can implement the entire range of our e-mail marketing measures. This ranges from sending newsletters and transactional emails to complex mail sequences. Via the API, we enrich subscriber information in a GDPR-compliant manner in order to target specific segments and perform A/B tests. ELAINE helps us and our customers to expand our email marketing measures and make them more successful.
